ch.unige.ng.gen
Class Context

java.lang.Object
  ch.unige.ng.gen.Context

public class Context
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains some data:

  • The random number genrator
  • The state of the algorithm
  • It will contain the Multi-threading informations.
